scripts.dev: npm run generate:entities && concurrently "npm run generate:entities:watch" "vite"
scripts.dev:docker: npm run generate:entities && concurrently "npm run generate:entities:watch" "vite --host 0.0.0.0"
scripts.dev:local: sh -c 'npm run generate:entities > /dev/null 2>&1 && concurrently "npm run generate:entities:watch" "vite $@" > /dev/null 2>&1 & echo "Dev server started in background. Use pkill -f man-template-repo/project to stop."' --
scripts.build: npm install && npm run generate:entities && vite build
